page.title: 14RECREATION, West Cambs.
page.content:
Some hobbies/pastimes in addition to taking part in village events (see also CLUBS/MUSIC) eg Fetes, music/ bingo/quiz evenings in village hall. (Most houses have gardens attached. Cricket/football teams in villages)
Hunting (see photograph C) Riding School at Stow Longa
Sports - at Huntingdon/St Neots eg golf/judo/table-tennis/swimming/snook- er/archery/gymnastics/outdoor bowls - at Grafham Water eg Sailing, Wind- surfing, fishing (also nature walks) - at Peterborough eg watersports at Ferry Meadows; ice/roller skating (also Nene Valley Railway)
Boating on River Ouse between Bedford/ Huntingdon/Ely; rowing at Huntingdon, Bedford, St Neots and Peterborough
